title: Strengthening Leadership Practical Competencies: Workshop-Based Education for Enhancing Clinical Microaggression Response Skills

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental Communication Skills in Clinical Settings and Basic Concepts of Medical Ethics
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can accurately identify microaggression cases occurring in clinical settings with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can execute a three-step response strategy (Recognize-Evaluate-Respond) to microaggressions with 90% accuracy.
Learners receive self-efficacy evaluations indicating that over 70% can implement reporting procedures according to institutional policies.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
